references.paper_title: Objaverse: A universe of annotated 3d objects
references.reason: This paper introduces Objaverse, a large-scale 3D dataset that is a foundational dataset used in MARVEL-40M+ for training and evaluation

references.paper_title: InternVL: Scaling up vision foundation models and aligning for generic visual-linguistic tasks
references.reason: InternVL is a crucial multi-view vision-language model integrated in MARVEL's annotation pipeline for generating high-quality 3D captions.
Qwen-2.5 is a large language model used in the multi-level visual elaboration stage of the MARVEL annotation pipeline, producing high-quality, multi-level descriptions.
DreamFusion is a pioneering text-to-3D model that inspired the design of MARVEL-FX3D, a two-stage pipeline for high-fidelity text-to-3D generation.

references.paper_title: Sf3D: Stable fast 3d mesh reconstruction with uv-unwrapping and illumination disentanglement
references.reason: SF3D is the image-to-3D model utilized in the second stage of MARVEL-FX3D, enabling rapid and efficient conversion of images into textured 3D meshes.
